item.description:
Divine presence awaits you as we come together in celebration of St. Valentine.
Together we will invite the magic of LOVE into our ritual space and drink from her true blessings.

* Would you like to feel more connection to the Divine in your life?
* Are there unconscious patterns that show up in your life that you're ready to release?
* Are they blocking you from loving yourself and others more fully?
* Are you ready to experience more passion in your life than ever before?

During this safe and sacred gathering you will have the opportunity to connect deeply with yourself, the Divine, and other beautiful souls through movement, meditation, breath and sound.

Come and discover how meaningful connection - intimacy and love - is available right here, right now, any time you want it.

This Valentine Puja is open to singles and couples, beginners and seasoned practitioners.

You may wish to wear comfortable, colorful clothing and bring a bottle of water.

Please arrive by 5:45 pm as we will begin on time; the Gathering will end at 8 pm.

There is plenty of parking in the lot behind the studio or on the street.
item.name: Tantra Gathering: Valentine's Day Puja, Opening To The Beloved
